ygData.subject: RE: [EQ-Monks] Essence of Dol, Batons, yatta yatta
ygData.msgSnippet: I m going to start camping Raster not that I m 40 but I solo and I already got the book from the Targin the rock by accident I soloed him at 37. ... From:
ygData.messageBody:
I'm going to start camping Raster not that I'm 40 but I solo and I already
got the book from the Targin the rock by accident I soloed him at 37.

-----Original Message-----
From: David Frascone [mailto:dave@...]
Sent: Monday, August 28, 2000 1:22 PM
To: EQ-Monks@egroups.com
Subject: Re: [EQ-Monks] Essence of Dol, Batons, yatta yatta


Is everyone dead? I finally got the essence of Dol and baton. I had to
save
up 3kp to get it. (Luckily, my wife quit eq, so I got to sell all of her
stuff,
and managed to get 4.2kp out of it)

So, I'm hanging out in Dalnir, praying that I manage to get some crescent
armor.

But, I've started jonesing for quests again. What level do I have to be to
start trying to get the Robe of the Lost circle? I'd prefer to go with a
small
group of a bit higher than me (say a group of 3 35s-40s), or a full group of

low 30s.

Any chance in hell I can camp the spawns at that level?
